<description>**Part 1: A rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom** The first part is a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom. It will be constructed using the given specifications. 1. Line 3: Start Point at (0.0469, 0.0469), End Point at (0.0, 0.0469) 4. Line 4: Start Point at (0.0, 0.0469), End Point at (0.0, 0.0) 4. Translate the 2D sketch by the given translation vector. 5. Remember that the first part (prism) will remain unaltered during the creation of the second part (tapered prism). These instructions do not include any boolean or other operations with the base prism.</description>
